devdoc.details: A token holder contract that can release its token balance gradually like a typical vesting scheme, with a vesting period.

constructor.details: Creates a vesting contract that vests its balance of any ERC20 token to the beneficiary, gradually in a linear fashion until start + duration. By then all of the balance will have vested.

params.beneficiary: address of the beneficiary to whom vested tokens are transferred
params.initialRelease: The amount of token can be released with the first release

returns._0: the duration of the token vesting.
the initial release of the tokens.

params.token: ERC20 token which is being vested

returns._0: the amount of the token released.
the start time of the token vesting.

devdoc.title: TokenVesting
